quotes.quote: Don't over-document: Just document the eyebrow-raising lines and the stuff that isn't so obvious.
quotes.author: keyle, Hacker News

quotes.quote: In theory, theory and practice are the same. In practice, they are not.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy.
quotes.author: Rumi
